newsitem.title: GHANA: Ghana stock index rises in quiet trade.
newsitem.headline: Ghana stock index rises in quiet trade.

text.p: Ghana stock indicators rose in low turnover on Friday as three modest gainers outweighed a 10-cedi loss by Enterprise Insurance Company, trading results showed.
The GSE All-Share Index rose 0.64 points to 375.84 and total market capitalisation rose to 3,266.82 billion cedis from 3,265.93 billion.
Enterprise Insurance ended at 440. Social Security Bank rose eight cedis to 1,018, Pioneer Aluminium Factory was three better at 148 and Ghana Commercial Bank was two up at 692 cedis.
Offers exceeded bids by 841,140 shares to 142,680 and only 28,850 were traded.
The stock index ended last week at 372.68 points and total market capitalisation was 3,121.67 billion cedis.
Trading this week featured a nine percent fall in the value of Accra Brewery shares on Monday and a 5.3 percent gain for Mobil Oil on Wednesday.
Total turnover for the week was a modest 352,930 shares.
